duties_responsibilities.duty: Processing invoices received from multiple locations and vendors on a daily basis, reconciling vendor statements, and responding to internal and external customer inquiries.
Complying with accounting and department policies, adapting to changes directed by AP Management, and performing vendor statement reconciliations.
Supporting month end processes and performing special projects and other duties as assigned.
Developing and maintaining relations with internal and external parties, providing excellent customer service.
Understanding and observing all confidentialities and ability to work extended workdays for month end closing to support business needs.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, familiarity with Sarbanes-Oxley, Proficiency with MS Office Suite, and understanding of finance, accounting, and financial controls.
At least three years of progressive A/P experience in an automated environment, proficiency with JD Edwards AP system.
